article: Mr . Weeks is fifty years old . He ' s taught maths in a middle school for twenty years . He works and always comes to his office on time . He hopes his students will be honest and he is strict with them . Some of his students have become famous persons , but they still remember him and often write to him . Of course the man is proud of them . This term he began to teach Grade One . Some of the new students were told about him , but the others did n ' t know about him . On the first day of school he told the students how to be an honest person . He gave them some examples and said , " I do n ' t like telling a lie . " Before class was over , he told all his students to finish Exercise 8 in Lesson 1 . The next morning , as soon as he came into the classroom , he asked . " Who ' s finished Exercise 8 ? " A few students raised their hands . He shook his head and said . " Open your workbooks and see if there ' s Exercise 8 in Lesson 1 . " The students had a look at their workbooks and their faces turned red at once .
questions: What is Mr . Weeks proud of ' ?

model: he is strict with his students .
all his students have been honest .
some of his students have been famous .
human: All his students have become famous persons .
All his students often write to him .
He ' s been a teacher for twenty - six years .
